APU Timetable does not collect or store any data from the user. For exporting the courses you will be asked to sign into and allow this app to access your Google Calender. Your access and allowance history to this app may be stored on Google's servers however this app doesn't store any of this data. For more information regarding Google Calender look here https://support.google.com/calendar/answer/10366125?hl=en.
